Significance Level (α) │ │ └─▶ Typically 0.05 (5%) │ │ └─▶ Probability of Type I error (false positive) │ │ │ │ 2. Statistical Power (1-β) │ │ └─▶ Typically 0.80 (80%) │ │ └─▶ Probability of detecting true effect │ │ │ │ 3. Minimum Detectable Effect (MDE) │ │ └─▶ Smallest effect worth detecting │ │ └─▶ Business-driven decision │ │ │ │ 4. Baseline Variance │ │ └─▶ How much natural variation exists │ │ └─▶ Often estimated from historical data │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
